title: New: Stonefox – This City
body:
**Stonefox** exploded out the gates with their debut track, _All I Want_, proving an unassuming online success.

Having followed it up with the anthemic, rousing, _Heart_, the trio are piecing together a five track EP, with _This City_ being the first cut taken from it. Plucking out the more electronic elements of their sound, it’s not too far from Lorde’s Pure Heroine, in it’s admirably honesty and undeniable quality. Check it out below.
